    • Method Detail

      • notifyFreeRegister

        public void notifyFreeRegister()
        Call when payEvent is done, notifies that one register is now open.

        public boolean isRegisterOpen()
        Checks if a Register is open.
        Returns:
        true if a Register is open, false otherwise.

      • isStoreFull

        public boolean isStoreFull()
        Checks if the store is currently full or not
        Returns:
        true if store is full, false otherwise.

      • notifyCostumerEnteredStore

        public void notifyCostumerEnteredStore()
        Call when a costumer enters the store, updates current number of costumers in store.

      • addCostumerQueue

        public void addCostumerQueue()
        Adds a costumer to queueStatistics. (Should be called when a costumers needs to queue)

      • addMissedCostumer

        public void addMissedCostumer()
        Adds a missed costumer to the missedCostumer statistics. (Should be called when a person leaves the store without paying)

      • getQueueAmount

        public int getQueueAmount()
        Returns:
        total number of costumers that have queued.

      • getMissedCostumers

        public int getMissedCostumers()
        Returns:
        total number of costumers leaving without paying.

      • getTimeRegistrers

        public long getTimeRegistrers()
        Returns:
        total time registers are used in milliseconds since store opened

      • getTimeCostumerQueue

        public long getTimeCostumerQueue()
        Returns:
        total time costumers have been in queue since store opened.
